quotes.quote: A shoe is not only a design, but it's a part of your body language, the way you walk. The way you're going to move is quite dictated by your shoes.
Shoes make an outfit. You can throw on a crazy shirt and crazy pants but you add those shoes - done.
You can never take too much care over the choice of your shoes. Too many women think that they are unimportant, but the real proof of an elegant woman is what is on her feet.
Shoes must have very high heels and platforms to put women's beauty on a pedestal.
Shoes are like friends, they can support you, or take you down
Unshined shoes are the end of civilization.
Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world.
For women, shoes are the most important. Good shoes take you good places.
Always wear expensive shoes. People notice.
Shoes transform your body language and attitude. They lift you physically and emotionally.
A woman with good shoes is never ugly.
A shoe without sex appeal is as barren as a tree without leaves.
I can be naked as long as I'm wearing the right pair of shoes.
A naked woman in heels is a beautiful thing. A naked man in shoes looks like a fool.
Putting on fierce boots is an instant pick-me-up.
You cannot put the same shoe on every foot.
Shoes are the quickest way for women to achieve instant metamorphosis.
Shoes are the first adult machines we are given to master.
It's easier to put on a pair of shoes than to wrap the earth in leather.
You want to fall in love with a shoe, go ahead. A shoe can't love you back, but, on the other hand, a shoe can't hurt you too deeply either. And there are so many nice-looking shoes.
Shoes are the finishing touch on any outfit and it is important to complete a look with the perfect pair!
I've always looked at shoes as being immensely beautiful things.
Shoes are a big part of your look. I think that if your outfit isn't really something special, then fun footwear is a great way to jazz it up and make your ensemble more interesting.
I don't know who invented high heels, but all women owe him a lot.
Never underestimate the power of a shoe.
The right shoe can make everything different.
My shoes are special shoes for discerning feet.
If the shoe fits it's too expensive.
You can wear anything as long as you put a nice pair of shoes with it.
What do women want? Shoes.
